options.content: Metrics collected from a Lighthouse Beacon Node.

panels.title: Summary of Events in the Previous Epoch

options.content: Contains the summary of validator events in the previous epoch. These figures can be used to monitor the performance and online-ness of specific validators.

panels.title: Prev Epoch Attestation included in Block
Prev Epoch Attestation included in Aggregate
Minimum Message Delays in the Previous Epoch

options.content: These are the delays between when a message was due and when we recieved it. The values displayed here are the minimum delays per validator.

panels.title: Prev Epoch Min Attestation Inclusion Delay (Slots)
Prev Epoch Min Unagg. Attestation Delay
Prev Epoch Min Aggregate Attestation Delay
Attestation Inclusion in a Block per Minute

options.content: Displays events happening per validator in real-time.

panels.title: Attestation inclusion in Block per Minute
Attestation inclusion in Aggregate per Minute

options.content: Displays message delays per validator in real-time.
